content: > a free version of this pattern is > available on my website as a photo > tutorial the paid-for version > includes a written-only us pdf and a > photo tutorial us pdf all the versions free and paid > include the charts these ammonite wrist warmers are my whimsical nod to treasure hunting along the jurassic coast they celebrate the gorgeous pebble beaches and the ammonites that wash up on the shore they work up quickly and would make a brilliant gift for someone you love these wrist warmers are highly customisable you can make them bigger smaller longer shorter…you can even use sock weight yarn or chunky yarn as long as you adjust the number of stitches and row as explained in the photo tutorial if you do decide to use a different yarn weight please keep in mind that the ammonite is the only part of this pattern that isn t easy to size up or down so you will have to wing it enjoy dedri
